nodes.text: A Senior Administrator was a position held by certain individuals within the Czerka Corporation.

One individual who held this title was hunting on Hutta during the Cold War, accompanied by several battle droids. While on his trip, a bounty hunter destroyed all his droids and confronted him, demanding he cease killing the natives. Wanting to be left alone, he attempted to bribe the bounty hunter. The administrator was unable to buy his way out of the predicament and was shot by the bounty hunter.
